name: Etude Remixed EP
summary:
Released on Otographic Music in 2012, Nhato's 1st artist album "Etude" pointed the new stage in the evolution of electronic music. It was supported by Armin van Buuren, Gareth Emery, Porter Robinson, and appeared at the 7th place on Beatport all-genre chart.

This remixed EP includes five remixes which present exceptional talents of Otographic family from Japan. It starts with KIWAMU's "Hello World" remix that provides gentle grooves and spreading energies to fill a wide open space. Kazusa, already known for his worldwide success in Silk Music, makes his Otographic debut with the deep and percussive reconstruction of the original album title track "Etude". Masanori Yasuda's remix of "Last Duty" has the solid rhythm and the mystic atmosphere constructed with the delicate layer of pads and piano. Then, "Chameleonic" remixed by Kyohei Akagawa drops the groove bomb with glittering synths and shuffled beats. Finally, the EP ends up with Shingo Nakamura's remix of "Hello World" that represents the dramatic piano breakdown and the transparent soundscape.
